rules_text:
When Travellers on Yonder enters, you may provision. [i](To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)[/i]
Whenever you provision, put a +1/+1 counter on Travellers on Yonder.
flavor_text: [i]“Good tidings, Sigrid. My name is Anne. I do not know of such a stone, but I believe we can take you to someone who will.”[/i]
